actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Rules.

official_title: Resolution to amend the Rules of the House of Representatives to limit the number of years a Member may be chairman of a standing committee.

summary.text: Amends rule X of the Rules of the House of Representatives to provide that any Member who has been chairman of a standing committee for six years in the aggregate, or who, if elected chairman of a standing committee during a Congress, would serve as chairman of that standing committee for six years before the end of that Congress, may not be elected chairman of that standing committee.

titles.title: Resolution to amend the Rules of the House of Representatives to limit the number of years a Member may be chairman of a standing committee.
